polar.help: xml file with infos on polarizability tensor

optimize.help: if 'true', refine atomic polarizabilities to match molecular polarizable volume specified in target.molpol

molpol.help: target polarizability tensor in format xx xy xz yy yz zz (this should be in the eigen-frame, hence xy = xz = yz = 0), if optimize=true the associated polarizable volume will be matched iteratively and the resulting set of polar sites written to mpsfiles.output

tolerance.help: relative tolerance when optimizing the polarizable volume
